q_ch: 对所有结束时间在2024年7月前，且未完成的裁剪任务中，计划裁剪数量最多的任务是什么？
q_en: What is the task with the highest planned quantity among all cutting tasks that have not been completed and have an end date before July 2024??
gt:
Hey there! 😄

I've got the details for you! The task with the highest planned quantity among all cutting tasks that haven't been completed and have an end date before July 2024 is as follows:

| Task ID | Planned Quantity | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group   | Order Product ID | Product Attributes | Product Type |
|---------|------------------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|------------------|--------------------|--------------|
| 5       | 260              | January 10, 2024 | February 2, 2024 | Master Sewers   | 5                | Yellow, S size     | T-shirt      |

Looks like the Master Sewers are working on a T-shirt with some vibrant yellow color in size S! 🌟 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id, planned_number FROM cutting_tasks WHERE status != 2 AND end_time < '2024-07-01';
steps.description: Retrieve all cutting tasks that have not been completed and have an end date before July 2024

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.planned_number, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id, p.attributes AS product_attributes, pt.description AS product_type FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE ct.id = '5';
steps.description:
Identify the task with the highest planned quantity from the retrieved tasks
Thought Compare the planned_number of each task from Step1 to find the maximum value and identify the corresponding task ID.

Step3: Retrieve the details of the task with the highest planned quantity
